ModMetaData.name: An Unfortunate Misfeed
ModMetaData.author: Lempface
ModMetaData.description:
V1.0 Guns can jam!
This mod adds a chance for a gun to jam when firing. This chance is based on the quality of the firearm. A pawn will attempt to clear the jam when they would next fire. Clearing a jam is based on the shooting skill of the weapon holder.
